Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.places

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.places.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameBoard extends Object implements Serializable
Gameboard representation. Model's main class.
